tasks.title: Implement Vertical Sidebar UI (Arc-style)
tasks.context: Create a collapsible sidebar in React. Move 'Command Bar' to be accessible via shortcut (Cmd+K) or persistent button. Use simple, elegant icons.

tasks.title: Implement Core Web Browsing
tasks.context: Implemented webview-based architecture for full CSS z-index layering support. Sidebar floats over web content with blur effect.

subtasks.title: Add BrowserView/webview component for web content
Create URL/address bar with navigation
Add navigation controls (back, forward, refresh)
Implement tab management (create, close, switch)
Add loading states and progress indicator
Handle page title and favicon updates

tasks.title: Brave-level Native Ad Blocker
tasks.context: Use @ghostery/adblocker-electron. Fixed Electron 20+ compatibility issues by shimming registerPreloadScript. Enabled on both main process and renderer <webview> sessions.

subtasks.title: Install and configure electron-ad-blocker
Load EasyList and other filter lists
Fix registerPreloadScript compatibility issue

tasks.title: AI Agent Integration (browser-use)
tasks.context: Python FastAPI backend using browser-use library for webpage automation. Agent can click, type, scroll, navigate.

subtasks.title: Set up Python backend with FastAPI
Integrate browser-use library
Create /agent/run endpoint
Connect frontend Command Bar to backend

tasks.title: Beautiful Home Page (poseidon:// internal page)
tasks.context: Custom internal page with Command Bar, quick links, and recent sites. Handles poseidon://newtab URLs.

subtasks.title: Create HomePage component with gradient background
Implement poseidon:// URL scheme
Add quick links grid with favicons
Integrate Command Bar for search/AI

tasks.title: Smart Settings (poseidon://settings)
tasks.context: Internal settings page for preferences, AI provider config, themes, privacy settings.

tasks.title: URL Autocomplete with History & Suggestions
tasks.context: JSON-based history storage with browser history and Google search suggestions. IPC handlers for search.

subtasks.title: Implement JSON history storage (temporary)
Store visited URLs with title, favicon, visit count, timestamp
Create IPC handlers for history search/autocomplete
Add autocomplete dropdown to CommandBar and TopBar
Add Google search suggestions via IPC (CORS bypass)

tasks.title: Upgrade History to SQLite Database
tasks.context: Replace JSON file storage with better-sqlite3 for production scalability. Current JSON implementation limited to 1000 entries. SQLite needed for millions of history entries with indexed search.

subtasks.title: Configure electron-rebuild for native modules
Mark better-sqlite3 as external and copy .node binary
Migrate history storage from JSON to SQLite
Add database indexes for fast search

tasks.title: Fix URL Bar Not Updating on Navigation
tasks.context: URL bar shows old URL (e.g., google.com) after clicking links to navigate to new pages. Fixed by syncing renderer <webview> state to main process via IPC.

tasks.title: Fix Suggestion Dropdown Persisting After Navigation
tasks.context: Suggestions remained open when manually typing a URL/search and pressing Enter, due to late-arriving async fetch results. Fixed by checking input focus before showing results.

tasks.title: Implement Aggressive Ad & Popup Blocking for Streaming Sites
tasks.context: Block popups and new tabs on streaming sites (football matches) using ad blocker engine logic. Similar to Brave's aggressive blocking.
